hero.title: Protect Your Digital Identity
hero.subtitle: Data breaches are on the rise. Check if your email, password, or URLs are compromised — instantly and securely.

whySecurity.title: Why Security Matters Now More Than Ever

billions.title: Billions of Records Leaked
billions.desc: Cyberattacks are increasing exponentially. Billions of personal records are exposed every year on the dark web.

financial.title: Financial Loss
financial.desc: Identity theft can lead to significant financial loss and ruin your credit score. Early detection is key.

proactive.title: Proactive Protection
proactive.desc: Don't wait for a breach to happen. Regularly checking your credentials helps you stay one step ahead of hackers.

dataSecurity.title: Your Data Security Matters to Us
dataSecurity.subtitle: We believe security tools should be transparent and privacy-focused. Here's how we protect your data while keeping you safe.

zeroStorage.title: Zero Data Storage
zeroStorage.desc: We never store your passwords, emails, or sensitive data on our servers. All checks are performed in real-time and discarded immediately.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy-First Design
privacyFirst.desc: Password checks use k-Anonymity hashing. Your actual password never leaves your browser in plain text—only a partial hash is sent.

transparent.title: Transparent Operations
transparent.desc: All breach checks use publicly available databases and APIs. No hidden tracking, no data mining, no third-party analytics.

dataSecurity.howProtects: How Each Service Protects Your Privacy

email.title: Email Breach Checker
email.desc: Find out if your email has been compromised in any known data breaches.

password.title: Password Strength Analyzer
password.desc: Test your password strength and check if it's been leaked in breaches.

url.title: URL Safety Scanner
url.desc: Verify if a website is safe to visit or if it's been flagged for phishing or malware.

ip.title: IP Privacy Scanner
ip.desc: Check what your IP address reveals about your location, ISP, and connection privacy.

owasp.title: OWASP Config Scanner
owasp.desc: Scan your site for missing security headers, SSL issues, and OWASP misconfigurations.
